ygData.subject: RE: Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t say that I have ever had a problem with the ogre.  I didn t even know to keep an eye out for him.  As a matter of habit, I illus to what ever race is
ygData.messageBody:
I can't say that I have ever had a problem with the ogre. I didn't even
know to keep an eye out for him. As a matter of habit, I illus to what ever
race is home to a city, and have always been a human in freeport. I have
not had a problem turning in all four items at once (done it 5 times).

Camai
15th Enchanter on Brell


-----Original Message-----
From: James Meyer [mailto:meyerj2@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 11:50 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Stein Quest



> Every time I did it I gave all the ingredients to him at once. As a high
elf, I never had a problem with the ogre, who actually cons better to me
than the barkeep does. Aren't factions screwy things?

That's because he is an ogre outcast. He was hated in Oggok and shunned,
because he was too smart. The barbarian saved him from Guk when he was
young, though, and they have been friends since. He is not quite a typical
ogre. I'm not sure exactly what faction he is, but he hates Enchanters in
Ogre form. : ) And DE form.


Eltanin Soulblade, Enchanter, Mith Marr
Saidan Soulblade, Paladin, Mith Marr


James Meyer
jamesm@ <mailto:jamesm@...> qett.com
